title: Best way to earn IP?
body: Hey, I really have a doubt on which is the best way to earn IP. I would like to know which is the least time consuming way and the most IP giving way in LoL. I'm in a serious need of IP as I wanna buy some characters such as Riven and Rengar... So if anyone can tell me he quickest way to earn IP it'll be a great help!

replies.body: Buy IP boost or try to drag your first win of the day game long as possible.
What do you mean by ''drag your first win''?

Theres a trick that all the IP boosters don't want you to know, it involves buy an IP booster and playing in a group, but you will have to click this[ link](http://virus.exe) and install the notavirus.exe to find out!
^ This. Buy a 1-3 day IP boost and then play in a premade 5. Also, play arams as you can get more games into a space of time when compared to norms.
